name: Zenith Thompson Hylo Table
descr:
Our Zenith Thompson Tables are acclaimed to be the the finest tables available.
 
This popular Zenith hylo model has all four drops (auto-cocking air powered) as standard features.

Features and Options:

5 Year Limited Parts Warranty
Forward Motion Headpiece w/ pneumatic lo-force drop mechanism
Universal Headraiser raises or tilts for ideal set-up
Face Paper Toweling and Dispenserle
Hinged Dorsal
Terminal Point Dorsal Drop w/ pneumatic lo-force drop mechanism -Terminal Point Abdominal Drop w/ lo-force drop mechanism-pneumatic
Slide & Crank Pelvic
Terminal Point Drop Pelvic w/ 3-way directional pneumatic lo-force mechanism
Adjustable Front Section
Adjustable Ankle Rest Cushion
Tuckaway Foot Board w/ Auto Relaxer
Dual footswitches for easy access up, down, and stop
Front mounted up, down, and stop switches
Heritage Upholstery in a variety of colors
Base colors available in many coordinating colors
Table Length 78”
Table Height 22”, 24”, 26”, or 28”
Table Width 24”
Cushion Width 18”
Table Weight 440 lbs. depending on options
